thread.title: Black Ops 3 Features 4-Player Split-Screen for Zombies, Multiplayer
thread.title_full: Black Ops 3 Features 4-Player Split-Screen for Zombies, Multiplayer

title: Black Ops 3 Features 4-Player Split-Screen for Zombies, Multiplayer
text:
Black Ops 3 Features 4-Player Split-Screen for Zombies, Multiplayer 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Today 
The upcoming Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 features 4-player split-screen for the Zombies mode and multiplayer, as well as 2-player split-screen...
